project_name.justification: The document title is 'K2 Gold Announces Agreement to Accelerate Acquisition of 100% of Si2 Project'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first sentence: 'K2 Gold Corporation (TSXV: KTO) ... today announced the signing of an agreement to acquire a 100% interest in the Si2 Project'.

ceo_buyer.justification: A quote in the article is attributed to 'Anthony Margarit, K2's President and CEO'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The press release states: 'K2 will acquire a 100% interest in Si2 by paying C$250,000 in cash or common shares of K2...'

primary_commodity.justification: The document states: 'Si2 hosts an early-stage epithermal gold system within the Walker Lane Trend...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the Si2 project acquisition by K2 Gold. The source link is provided at the bottom of the text: 'To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/237353'.

currency.justification: The payment is specified in Canadian dollars: 'K2 will acquire a 100% interest in Si2 by paying C$250,000 in cash or common shares of K2...'
